body: it's been 2 years and there's still no translation...

Aha lucky~. Its seems that the guy and his waifu got a quarrel then Maho having affection to him, visits him and things happens. Maho is a girl with needs, she has the right to choose who she'll do with whom as long its consensual so stop being a cuck and man up, guys. 
You guys have no right to choose what the other people will do.

From my meager Japanese reading abilities I have come to assume that: 1. She left h with their kid and as such no cheating is involved as far as I know ( don't play the game so don't know any relationships that are not portrayed here.) 2. She (maho)wanted to have sex because she saw her parents have sex and she also wants to be comforted because she is scared that people constantly change. 3. That was hot like damn son.

aaaand un-favorite the first one. I'm honestly disappointed.

I don't hate NTR, but this 2nd vol. Really breaking my heart as a man, that husband is a scum, his wife is pregnant, he has a little kid, and still distracted by another woman on top of that her wife BF. I'd like takeda hiromitsu's works and his way of NTR... this one is just... too much.
